item_title: CALL TO ORDER and ROLL CALL

item_blurb: GENERAL PUBLIC COMMENT. Public comments that are not related to any of the items specifically listed on the agenda will be heard at approximately 9:00 am, for no more than one hour. At the discretion of the Chair, speakers may be given up to 2 minutes. Due to the transition to a virtual meeting platform, the Coastal Commission at this time will not allow for the ceding of time from one speaker to another speaker. Note: You may address the Commission on a specific topic one time only each month. Please submit a request to speak by 5:00 pm the day before the hearing to assist with meeting management sign up. We will stop taking speaker requests by 8:30 am on each day of the meeting. Please see the Coastal Commission’s Virtual Hearing Procedures memo for submitting a request to speak.

subitem_title: Legislative Report
subitem_blurb: Status report and possible action on pending legislation. (JA/SC-SF)

subitem_status: Deny IP Amendment as Submitted/Approve IP Amendment with Suggested Mods

subitem_title: City of Laguna Beach LCP Amendment No. LCP-5-LGB-20-0004-3

(MA-LB)

(MV-LB)
subitem_status: SUBSTANTIAL ISSUE FOUND, de Novo Hearing CONTINUED

(AS-LB)

subitem_title: Application No. 5-18-0982 (Bolsa Chica Conservancy, Huntington Beach)

(MV-LB)
subitem_status: Moved to Consent Calendar, APPROVED WITH CONDITIONS

subitem_title: Application No. 5-19-0971 (Dana Point Harbor Partners, LLC, Dana Point)
subitem_blurb: Application of Dana Point Harbor Partners, LLC to: (1) replace 2,409 recreational boat slip marina with 2,254 recreational boat slip marina; (2) replace 11 yacht club slips with 13 yacht club slips in the Dana Point Yacht Club in Inner Basin; (3) replace 16 sportfishing charter slips and 1 dock-and-dine guest dock adjacent to Catalina ferry; (4) relocate and reconfigure fuel dock and emergency dock; (5) relocate bait dock, replace 16 commercial fishing slips, and install new drive-in boat wash in Outer Basin; (6) relocate and expand transient guest docks to Outer Basin; (7) replace 11 existing boater service buildings with 10 boater service buildings; (8) repair 9,964 linear feet of seawalls/revetment; (9) replace 1,644 designated boater parking spaces with 1,410 spaces; (10) and relocate and expand  parkscape and public access areas closer to the water, at 24650 Dana Point Harbor Dr., Dana Point, Orange County. (CP-LB)

subitem_title: Application No. 5-19-1036 (Blue Lagoon Community Association, Laguna Beach)
subitem_blurb: Application of Blue Lagoon Community Association for slope remediation on coastal bluff consisting of placement of shotcrete wall, brow ditches, and drainage pipe; replace lawn area with decomposed granite; and replant with low water use and native plants, at 30781 South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, Orange County. (MV-LB)

(MV-LB)
subitem_status: Moved to Consent Calendar, APPROVED WITH CONDITIONS

subitem_title: Application No. 5-19-1239 (City of San Clemente Department of Public Works Parking Meter Program)
subitem_blurb: Application of City of San Clemente Dept. of Public Works to remove City parking meters at two beach parking areas, including Camino Capistrano (14 double head meters, 1 single head), and Avenida Calafia (11 double head meters, 1 single head), and limit use of parking in these 2 locations to maximum duration of 4 hours; and change hours of operation for all other existing metered parking areas (North Beach, Linda Lane, Pier Bowl, T-Street/Paseo De Cristobal) to 9 am. to 10 pm. No change to the $1.50/hour fee is proposed, at San Clemente, Orange County. (MR-LB)

subitem_title: Application No. 5-19-1466 (City of Newport Beach Dock Improvements)

subitem_title: Appeal No. A-5-LGB-20-0001 (City of Laguna Beach Parking Fee Program)

(VL-LB)
